result: {"ok": true, "results": [{"id": 201162, "informal_statement": "For any normed abelian group \\(V\\), inner product space over \\(\\mathbb{R}\\) with dimension 2, and given an orientation \\(o\\) on \\(\\mathbb{R}\\) vector space \\(V\\) over \\(Fin\\ 2\\), along with vectors \\(x, y \\in V\\) and a scalar \\(r \\in \\mathbb{R}\\), show that the sign of the oriented angle \\((o.oangle (-x) y)\\) is equal to itself. Note: This statement is trivial as it asserts the sign is equal to itself, hence i

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Matrix

variable {n : Type _} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n]

/-- General linear group of n x n real matrices as units in the matrix monoid. -/
def GL (n : Type _) [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] : Type _ := Units (Matrix n n ℝ)

/-- Orthogonal group: those units whose matrix times its transpose is the identity. -/
def O (n : Type _) [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] : Set (GL n) := {A : GL n | (A : Matrix n n ℝ) * (A : Matrix n n ℝ)ᵀ = 1}

/-- Statement: O(n) equals the set of elements of GL(n) satisfying A Aᵀ = I. -/
theorem O_eq_GL_orth {n : Type _} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] :
  O n = {A : GL n | (A : Matrix n n ℝ) * (A : Matrix n n ℝ)ᵀ = 1} := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Matrix

/-- General linear group of invertible n×n real matrices, as a subtype of matrices. -/
def GL (n : Type _) [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] : Type _ := { A : Matrix n n ℝ // IsUnit A }

/-- Orthogonal group: those invertible matrices whose matrix times its transpose is the identity. -/
def O (n : Type _) [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] : Set (GL n) := { A | (A : Matrix n n ℝ) * (A : Matrix n n ℝ)ᵀ = 1 }

/-- Statement: O(n) equals the set of elements of GL(n) satisfying A Aᵀ = I. -/
theorem O_eq {n : Type _} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] :
  O n = { A : GL n | (A : Matrix n n ℝ) * (A : Matrix n n ℝ)ᵀ = 1 } := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Matrix

/-- General linear group of invertible n×n real matrices, as a subtype of matrices. -/
def MyGL (n : Type _) [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] : Type _ := { A : Matrix n n ℝ // IsUnit A }

/-- Orthogonal group: those invertible matrices whose matrix times its transpose is the identity. -/
def MyO (n : Type _) [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] : Set (MyGL n) := { A | (A : Matrix n n ℝ) * (A : Matrix n n ℝ)ᵀ = 1 }

/-- Statement: MyO(n) equals the set of elements of MyGL(n) satisfying A Aᵀ = I. -/
theorem MyO_eq {n : Type _} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] :
  MyO n = { A : MyGL n | (A : Matrix n n ℝ) * (A : Matrix n n ℝ)ᵀ = 1 } := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Matrix

/-- General linear group of invertible n×n real matrices, as a subtype of matrices. -/
def MyGL (n : Type _) [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] : Type _ := { A : Matrix n n ℝ // IsUnit A }

/-- Orthogonal group: those invertible matrices whose matrix times its transpose is the identity. -/
def MyO (n : Type _) [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] : Set (MyGL n) := { A : MyGL n | (A.1 : Matrix n n ℝ) * (A.1 : Matrix n n ℝ)ᵀ = 1 }

/-- Statement: MyO(n) equals the set of elements of MyGL(n) satisfying A Aᵀ = I. -/
theorem MyO_eq {n : Type _} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n] :
  MyO n = { A : MyGL n | (A.1 : Matrix n n ℝ) * (A.1 : Matrix n n ℝ)ᵀ = 1 } := by sorry
